name: next-auth-interview-case
description: 3-stage progressive frontend development interview case study

scripts.dev: echo 'Choose a stage: stage1, stage2, or stage3'
scripts.build: npm run build:stage1 && npm run build:stage2 && npm run build:stage3
scripts.build:stage3: cd stage3-microfrontend/home-app && npm run build && cd ../cart-app && npm run build && cd ../shell-app && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:stage1 && npm run test:stage2 && npm run test:stage3
scripts.test:stage3: cd stage3-microfrontend/home-app && npm test && cd ../cart-app && npm test
scripts.lint: npm run lint:stage1 && npm run lint:stage2 && npm run lint:stage3
scripts.lint:stage3: cd stage3-microfrontend/home-app && npm run lint && cd ../cart-app && npm run lint
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:stage1 && npm run type-check:stage2 && npm run type-check:stage3
scripts.type-check:stage3: cd stage3-microfrontend/home-app && npm run type-check && cd ../cart-app && npm run type-check
scripts.clean: npm run clean:stage1 && npm run clean:stage2 && npm run clean:stage3
scripts.clean:stage3: cd stage3-microfrontend/home-app && rm -rf .next node_modules && cd ../cart-app && rm -rf .next node_modules
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:stage1 && npm run install:stage2 && npm run install:stage3
scripts.install:stage3: cd stage3-microfrontend/home-app && npm install && cd ../cart-app && npm install && cd ../shell-app && npm install

author: Frontend Developer Interview
